title: High Noon Illaoi and Sivir
body:
hi! I wanted to explore another side of the high noon universe in which there is this tribe that purge the demons out of their homeland,  Illaoi is this sort of Shaman that uses the power of the blue Lizard/Snake to control the sprits and I though that Sivir with a dream catcher as her weapon it would be amazing, hope you enjoy the concepts <3 ty

https://imgur.com/1Cba91M
https://imgur.com/b5MxTHF
https://imgur.com/XLQ7GUN

replies.body: High Noon Sivir or Naked Sivir ?
When she turns around it's High Moon
most of her skins shes pretty much naked lmao.
ya say that but this skin would have more cloths then wonder sivir and huntress sivir
Naked Sivir is Called Huntress pretty much. Even her boomerang is naked there.

I feel like you over exaggerated Sivir's Adonis belt.
Other than that I like it.  Would be a nice and logical addition to the universe.

Though being honest I feel like the Vastaya would fit into the role of Shamans way better.  Ooh and Kindred!  Kindred would _rock_ this thematic.
Kindred does not equal skins
Neither does Illaoi but that doesn't matter now, does it?

It's not really high noon if they're modled after native americans, especially when their colors and designs suggest more northern tribes (even if the amount of "clothes" don't)

I find it unlikely riot will make native americans especially since people freaked out when Phara was given a native american skin when she IS native american.

I feel like it might be better to have it a seperate thing from high noon. Like Mystacism Illaoi or something.

> [{quoted}](name=ProExpertKing,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xznoKLfq,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-10-28T20:53:51.406+0000)
>
> It's not really high noon if they're modled after native americans, especially when their colors and designs suggest more northern tribes (even if the amount of "clothes" don't)
> 
> I find it unlikely riot will make native americans especially people freaked out when Phara was given a native american skin when she IS native american.

It would be likely be a shared parallel universe, though, the same way that Resistance goes with the Battlecast skins.  

The hard thing would be to know what to call it without sparking too much political controversy, as most First Nations-style terms still carry a lot of unwanted political baggage - but it's a fantastic concept and would really help High Noon be more representative of the fulller American West lore and culture it's based from.

The only thing is I don't feel like it was made to be representative, that's why they mostly just get random champions to make it more fun. I think Native Americans would also run weirdly in a universe where angels and demons exist, mostly because the religion that believe in hell also believe anything anyone else worships is just the devil tricking them.

I'm not against them trying to make representing skins it's just a I'm far aware of the baggage that Native Americans _in tandum with people with guns_ carries. I would love if maybe they took lots of different mystisim, maybe making one Native American, maybe making TF a fortune teller with Tarot cards and his w could even switch between the major arcarnas, and then you could even have a vodo craft champion. Also it would be nice if they were all chill together, don't make it a super action universe if you did so you can use the spread of positivity and inclusion if anyone gets mad about the mear inclusion of vodo or whatever.

> [{quoted}](name=ProExpertKing,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xznoKLfq,comment-id=000800010000,timestamp=2019-10-29T12:34:25.896+0000)
>
> The only thing is I don't feel like it was made to be representative, that's why they mostly just get random champions to make it more fun. I think Native Americans would also run weirdly in a universe where angels and demons exist, mostly because the religion that believe in hell also believe anything anyone else worships is just the devil tricking them.
> 
> I'm not against them trying to make representing skins it's just a I'm far away of the baggage that Native Americans _in tandum with people with guns_ carries. I would love if maybe they took lots of different mystisim, maybe making one Native American, maybe making TF a fortune teller with Tarot cards and his w could even switch between the major arcarnas, and then you could even have a vodo craft champion. Also it would be nice if they were all chill together, don't make it a super action universe if you did so you can use the spread of positivity and inclusion if anyone gets mad about the mear inclusion of vodo or whatever.

As we are fond of reminding people:  

Runeterra isn't Earth.  

One presumes Runeterra probably has tribal people of some kind, and because it is a setting for imagination, nothing says *anything* about them has to be the same as Earth's.

To me these pieces of art are a wonderful conversation starter on those possibilities, and I think many of your ideas are cool as well.  :)

Well high noon also isn't really set in Runeterra so I don't understand why that's relevent, especially when the skin is kinda based around real world concepts. I feel like the Runeterra =/= Earth is kinda a bad argument there.

If you're gonna base skins off of real world concepts though, then people are gonna constantly point that out. Project is unlike anything today so people talk about symbolizm in the stories and how cool their world is because it's unique and they focus on the unquieness. Not like High Noon where they are very up front on how it's mid-western american themed and doesn't stand much on it's own if you don't understand the base line of that already. It assumes you just understand because of the years of it being engrained in us. This does kinda cause a "I don't get it" though in other cultures much like how people recently didn't understand what K/DA was even supposed to be because they just never listen to K-Pop and aren't super big anime fans so they don't understand that culture.

These skins aren't set in the real world but they are influcened by the real world so saying stuff like "Runeterra =/= Earth" doesn't work to well, especially now since K/DA exists as a universe in the real world and also in pretty much ever other Universe like Odyessy and Star Guardian.

Whether Runeterra is Earth or not does not matter to the certain group of people who get offended VERY easily.

There is absolutely no reason why Riot would want to start drama concerning "racism" as those articles and social media birds will no doubt claim it to be.

> [{quoted}](name=ProExpertKing,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xznoKLfq,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-10-28T20:53:51.406+0000)
>
> It's not really high noon if they're modled after native americans, especially when their colors and designs suggest more northern tribes (even if the amount of "clothes" don't)
> 
> I find it unlikely riot will make native americans especially people freaked out when Phara was given a native american skin when she IS native american.

Could have sworn Phara was Egyptian ;x. She even had that eyelid tatoo.

She's half and half. Her Father is from a far north tribe, I don't think they ever specified if it's Alaskian or Canadian but it's certainly the place where you need THICK insulation from the cold during winter.
Yoo I love this idea so much. Call the skin line High Moon though. I can seriously get behind this idea.
High Moon! I love that name! I think you made that comment in reddit <3

Give Diana another amazing skin.

Every single one of her skins look amazing anyway!
High Noon is about the wild west with a firey theme. So they should be like bounty hunters, not natives. Its a nice design but does not fit the term High Noon or the rest of the skins.

I actually came here within intention to bash idea and then I saw pictures. Indian theme actually fits them and those are pretty nice drawings.

( Expected cowboy hats ü§† )
Yes, it's unique, I fully endorse, let's get riot in here
Oh I love this so much!
Please don't give Illaoi another skin I can't deal with more people playing her.

> [{quoted}](name=Oldschoolhockey,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xznoKLfq,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-10-28T17:50:47.794+0000)
>
> Please don't give Illaoi another skin I can't deal with more people playing her.

Boo hoo I can't run away from illaoi when she ults

Nah I'm just so bad against her. I don't know why but I can never beat her. It's really just something for me lmao. I can usually beat any top but Illaoi, so I just ban her. Plus it was a joke no need to be toxic lmao.

Sivir is a bit too buff imo. She's usually slender.

Otherwise, it's amazing.

This looks amazing. 
Can they also be freinds with Enchanted Galio ;)

But aside from that it's an interesting take on the high noon mythos
Oh great. Now I have a crush on a couple of character concepts. Such a nice thought though.
This deserves attention!
I loaf it
I would so get that illaoi skin that's awesome.
not enough fire, demons or skulls for high noon at this point.
fine!
Lovely new extension of the AU. Nice!

I feel like Sivir's design steps a little too much on Boomerang Sivir's deisgn:
https://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Sivir_3.jpg
Yeah, her Huntress skin does have a similar idea going on.
Is that the official name? I think I've called it Boomerang for years.
Yes, it's called Huntress. Though most people forget it exists xD
That is true. I think I've seen it in use all of once. I've just been too lazy to actually pick it up, despite the fact that I own everything in the bundle already.
